title: What’s Going To Happen to Pokémon GO? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.12.25
description:
Go to http://joinbilt.com/kindafunny to start earning points on your rent payments today.

Go to http://get.stash.com/KINDAFUNNY to see how you can receive $25 towards your 
first stock purchase and to view important disclosures.

Pokemon GO has been acquired by Scopely, the new Skate already has microtransactions, and Netflix Games sees a major loss.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
- GAMESCAST - WWE 2K25 Review
- Screencast afterwards is Daredevil
- The STREAM is Pokemon Nicklocke

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:12 - Housekeeping
             -  The Roper Report   -
00:08:04 - Pokémon Go developer Niantic to sell gaming business to Saudi group
00:17:57 - EA's Skate Gets Microtransactions Before Its Release Date
00:25:29 - SuperChats
00:31:15 - Netflix’s first gaming boss exits, following 2024 leadership shift
00:38:49 - The team co-developing the Metal Gear Solid 3 remake is opening a new studio
00:43:16 - Wild Blue was announced at the Humble Games Showcase
00:49:02 - Wee News! 
00:50:43 - SuperChats
00:56:59 - You‘re Wrong
